titlestmt.titleproper: Guide to the Davenport College, Yale University, Records of the Master
Davenport College, Yale University, Records of the Master
titlestmt.author: compiled by Daniel Hartwig

publicationstmt.publisher: Yale University. Department of Manuscripts and Archives

profiledesc.creation: This finding aid was produced using ArchivesSpace on Friday January 11, 2019 at 08:43

did.unittitle: Davenport College, Yale University, records of the master

repository.corpname: Yale University. Department of Manuscripts and Archives

did.abstract: The records consist of student records for the Classes of 1932-1951 and correspondence and committee files of Master Emerson Tuttle.

odd.head: General note
odd.p: Forms part of Yale Record Group 13-F-2 (YRG 13-F-2), Records of the master of Davenport College.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Davenport College, Yale University, Records of the Master (RU 444). Manuscripts and Archives, Yale University Library.

arrangement.head: Arrangement
arrangement.p: The records are arranged by accession.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: The records consist of student records for the Classes of 1932-1951 and correspondence and committee files of Master Emerson Tuttle.

bioghist.head: Biographical / Historical
bioghist.p: The title "Master" for chief executive officers of residential colleges was changed to "Head of College" in April of 2016.

accessrestrict.head: Conditions Governing Access
accessrestrict.p: Access to the materials is partially restricted. See inventory for details.

did.unittitle: Letters and excerpts from bound copy

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Contains lists of student names and room numbers, students withdrawn from Yale, and similar information.

did.unittitle: Allocations: H.E. Tuttle - Committee on Distribution
University: O, P, Q, R (including James Gamble Rogers)
University: H, I, J (including Frederic B. Johnson)
University: E, F (including Thomas W. Farnam, Sidney H. Francis, Robert D. French)

accessrestrict.head: Conditions Governing Access
accessrestrict.p: The materials are open for research.

accessrestrict.head: Conditions Governing Access
accessrestrict.p: The materials are open for research.
